description.p: Sacred weapons are often believed to be blessed by gods, goddesses, or other divine entities. They may represent important values or beliefs like symbols of faith, honor, or heritage. Some sacred weapons have a storied history or legendary provenance. Sacred weapons are typically wielded by champions, heroes, or religious leaders for specific purposes. In some traditions, sacred weapons are believed to offer protection against supernatural forces, evil spirits, or otherworldly threats.

setters.set: You can introduce sacred weapons to your campaign.

description.p: Chain blades are exotic weapons that consist of a pair of connected blades attached to a chain, with a handle in the center. The wielder can wrap the chains around their arm to gain better control over the weapon's movements and attacks. The chain blades can be swung around in a wide arc, making them effective against multiple opponents.
